title: Patch 5.19, turrets are not working properly

embed.description: ★Abre la descripción★ Muy buenas a todos chic@s aqui estamos de vuelta con un nuevo vídeo, espero que lo disfruteis y que os divirtais y si os hechais unas risas pues mejor! Un like y un favoritos ayuda muchisimo para seguir creciendo en youtube! Si no estas suscrito hazlo, no lo dudes!

body:
As you can see in this patch things do not go quite right, many bugs and polish things. Many games have happened to me, turrets do not hit or damage unless the enemy attacks being beneath them, or just do not attack.
RITE solutions I hope all these problems as soon as possible
